mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (user_id, password, name, email, phone, count, last_login_time, status, status_update_time, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{count}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{status}, #{statusUpdateTime}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, password, name, email, phone, count, last_login_time, status, status_update_time, create_time FROM MEMBER WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, user_id, password, name, email, phone, count, last_login_time, status, status_update_time, create_time FROM MEMBER WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT id, user_id, password, name, email, phone, count, last_login_time, status, status_update_time, create_time FROM MEMBER WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET user_id = #{userId}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, count = #{count}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, status = #{status}, status_update_time = #{statusUpdateTime}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE MEMBER SET password = #{password} WHERE id = #{id}
